channel.title: Project Lax Not Delta!
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Please dont be to mean my first Server Relase[/size]
Tutorial Island: Our tutorial island is totally custom made. It gives you the chance to go through it, which will basically teach you where, and how to train combat skills, non-combat skills, and other things like that. If you decide to skip the tutorial island, you can just simply click the door, and it will teleport you out. The only downside to this, is that you don't get a reward which you would originally get for completing the island.
Emote System: We decided it would be cool to add the SWAT Emote & Animation system, therefor, we have the new animations, and emotes. This includes the following emotes: -Whip -Rune C'bow -Defender -Vengeance And a bunch more. We also have animations, such as the Runescape bolt specials. We'll release god swords as a future update. - Training: We have added a whole whack-load of training areas. All of these training areas are 100% customly designed by the coders of 317-Revolution. You'll have to view these training areas in game, or view some of the images we've taken of them.
Monsters: Kq Kbd dagganoths
Minis: Pest Control Barrows Duel Arena
Pking Spots:
Hill Giants Mage Bank Varrock Edge
Godsword stances:p
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2rc1niw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/a5fc6f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/dywu20.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/10df886.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/35hqpmv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/9azv3o.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1ywd9z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/29w70bn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vtv2q0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qlwsab.png[/img]
Soruce: http://www.mediafire.com/?y5nzgjxnzt5 Client: will relase soon just use any battle scape client for now

item.title: Project Lax Not Delta!
item.dc:creator: @naomai naomai
item.description:
@naomai wrote:

This made me lul:

Please dont be to mean my first Server Relase

Tutorial Island: Our tutorial island is totally custom made. It gives you the chance to go through it, which will basically teach you where, and how to train combat skills, non-combat skills, and other things like that. If you decide to skip the tutorial island, you can just simply click the door, and it will teleport you out. The only downside to this, is that you don’t get a reward which you would originally get for completing the island.

Emote System: We decided it would be cool to add the SWAT Emote & Animation system, therefor, we have the new animations, and emotes. This includes the following emotes:
-Whip
-Rune C’bow
-Defender
-Vengeance
And a bunch more. We also have animations, such as the Runescape bolt specials. We’ll release god swords as a future update.

  • Training: We have added a whole whack-load of training areas. All of these training areas are 100% customly designed by the coders of 317-Revolution. You’ll have to view these training areas in game, or view some of the images we’ve taken of them.

The revolution By situations:

Tutorial Island: Our tutorial island is totally custom made. It gives you the chance to go through it, which will basically teach you where, and how to train combat skills, non-combat skills, and other things like that. If you decide to skip the tutorial island, you can just simply click the door, and it will teleport you out. The only downside to this, is that you don’t get a reward which you would originally get for completing the island.

Emote System: We decided it would be cool to add the SWAT Emote & Animation system, therefor, we have the new animations, and emotes. This includes the following emotes:

-Whip
-Rune C’bow
-Defender
-Vengeance
And a bunch more. We also have animations, such as the Runescape bolt specials. We’ll release god swords as a future update.

  • Training: We have added a whole whack-load of training areas. All of these training areas are 100% customly designed by the coders of 317-Revolution. You’ll have to view these training areas in game, or view some of the images we’ve taken of them.

Shops & Home: All of our shops have been redone. We’ve also redone all the prices to collaborate properly with Palidino76’s economy. Our home is also redone, and based in Edgeville. We’re hoping that you guys, (being the players) will enjoy having a small home. Once our community expands, our home will be moved to a more larger area, such as Varrock, or Falidor.

Teleports: We’ve added a whole new teleportion system into our server. We have Teleportation tablets, that vary over 10 different teleports, and we also renamed, and made a bunch of custom teleports. We’re hoping that redesigning our teleportation system will help attract more players.

whos the leecher?

Read full topic
